original_title: Innocence and Experience: The Making of 'The Age of Innocence'
overview: A documentary about the making of director Martin Scorsese's 1993 film adaptation of Edith Wharton's Pulitzer Prize-winning novel, The Age of Innocence. It features a conversation between Scorsese and the star of the film, Daniel Day Lewis, as well as rare behind-the-scenes footage.
title: Innocence and Experience: The Making of 'The Age of Innocence'
